name.es: Almacén de contraseñas de Safeguard Enterprise
name.fr: Coffre de mot de passe entreprise Safeguard
name.ja: Safeguard エンタープライズ用パスワードボールト

short.es: Almacén de contraseñas de Safeguard Enterprise
short.fr: Coffre de mot de passe entreprise Safeguard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension requires a Safeguard for Privileged Passwords appliance with a license to use the Enterprise Password Vault feature.

Safeguard for Privileged Passwords automates, secures and simplifies granting privileged credentials, and it also eliminates concerns about secured access. It allows managing passwords using almost any device and its small learning curve accelerates adoption. The result is a secured enterprise and a new level of freedom and functionality for privileged users.
 
This extension allows users to inject credentials secured in Safeguard for Privileged Passwords into business-critical websites.
